text: Ruguo fuqin xiwang [ji ziji de haizi] wancheng buru qi, muqin ying ji ziji de haizi buru liang zheng nian, dan fuqin ying heli gongji tamen yishi. Mei ren zhi an qi nengli fudan, muqin buyao yin ziji de haizi er shou nuedai, fuqin ye buyao yin ziji de haizi er chikui.[Fuqin si hou], jichengren yeyou tongyang de zeren [ji you zeren fuyang haizi zhang da chengren]. Jiaru shuangfang jingguo xieshang tongyi duannai, dui ta lia shi wu zui de. Jiaru nimen jueding gu rumu buru nimen de haizi, dui nimen shi wu zui de, dan nimen ying heli zhifu nimen suo daying [gei ta] de choujin. Nimen dang jingwei an la. Nimen dang zhidao, fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la que shi quan shi de.
